episodes.title: House of Israel: The Cult Behind Walter Rodney’s Death in Guyana
episodes.description:
Dive into the shocking story of the House of Israel, a religious movement that became a powerful political force in 1970s and 1980s Guyana. Led by Rabbi Edward Emmanuel Washington, this organization blurred the lines between faith, politics, and power — culminating in violence, intimidation, and the tragic death of historian Walter Rodney.

In this investigative documentary by we explore the rise, influence, and ultimate decline of the House of Israel, uncovering how religion and politics intertwined in one of the Caribbean’s most controversial chapters.

Subscribe for more true crime and historical investigations.
